topics.body:
>I go out tonight with my roommate
>Dinner at sushi bar
>I end up with leftovers
>When we get back to dorm, I try to put leftovers in fridge
>Roommate tries to stop me, thinks I'm crazy or something
>Roommate goes to bathroom
>*I put leftovers in fridge*
>Roommate come out of bathroom
>Finds leftovers in fridge
>*Shrugs it off*

>*mfw*
!http://media.giphy.com/media/L87iIzGlzEoyk/giphy.gif!
[spoiler]Huh, never really done a 4chan-style post before. How'd I do?[/spoiler]

topics.body:
"@trashboat":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54b5d6246368721397a50000#post_54b5d6246368721397a50000
SJW have actually given the world something that in retrospect makes the world a better place; a group for people of all religions, political ideologies, sexualities, genders and ALL of geek culture to universally hate together.  There has been compared to before all of this drama shit started very little inter-fandom drama or such cause now the majority of fandoms or such drama is everyone universally hating sjw.  What I mean by this is that basically before this drama started every couple of weeks there would be <x> geek subculture having a fight with <y> geek subculture; now *every* geek subculture is universally hating sjw.  Yadda yadda nothing unites people like a common enemy.
